data.name: HoYoShadeDownloadView_Title
data.value: First, let's download and install the HoYoShade framework

data.name: HoYoShadeDownloadView_StatusAssetNotFound
data.value: Asset not found for selected options.

data.name: HoYoShadeDownloadView_HoYoShade_Description
data.value: The full HoYoShade package, including all built-in presets and other resources, is suitable for general users.

data.name: HoYoShadeDownloadView_OpenHoYoShade_Description
data.value: This package contains only the basic framework, without any built-in presets or other resources, making it suitable for developers who want to build upon it.

data.name: HoYoShadeDownloadView_LatestVersionTip
data.value: Unless you know what you're doing, installing the latest version is usually the best choice.

data.name: HoYoShadeDownloadView_PackageVersionTooOld
data.value: Package version {0} is too old. Please use V3 or above.

data.name: HoYoShadeDownloadView_PackageSHA256Mismatch
data.value: Package SHA256 checksum mismatch. The file may be corrupted or modified.

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_Title
data.value: Next, let's download and install ReShade shaders and addons

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_Description
data.value:
You need to download and install ReShade shaders and addons for HoYoShade to work properly. However, for OpenHoYoShade, this step is optional because it is intended for development purposes. If you installed OpenHoYoShade, we recommend skipping this step. The list of available shaders and addons is synchronized with the official ReShade installer and controlled by ReShade.
Due to ReShade version updates, previously available shaders/addons may not appear in this list and cannot be downloaded or installed. We cannot do anything about this. If you need to install shaders/addons that are not in the list, we recommend manually adding them after installation.
If you are unsure what to choose, we recommend downloading and installing all shaders/addons.

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_InstallToBoth
data.value: Install to both HoYoShade and OpenHoYoShade

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_OpenHoYoShadeWarning
data.value: OpenHoYoShade is intended for development purposes. We recommend skipping the installation of ReShade shaders and addons for it.

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_BothTargetsWarning
data.value: OpenHoYoShade is intended for development purposes. We recommend installing to HoYoShade only.

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_InstallAll
data.value: Download and install all ReShade shaders and addons

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_InstallEssentialOnly
data.value: Download and install essential ReShade shaders only, no addons

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_CustomizeInstall
data.value: Customize shaders and addons to install

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_ImportHint
data.value: Or, import from local package or folder

data.name: ReShadeDownloadView_FolderStructureInvalid
data.value: Invalid folder structure. The selected folder must contain "Shaders" and "Textures" folders. "Addons" folder is optional. No other folders are allowed.

data.name: UninstallShadeDialog_ConfirmUninstallTitle
data.value: Are you sure you want to uninstall {0}?

data.name: UninstallShadeDialog_WarningMessage1
data.value: This will delete all installed {0} shaders, addons, presets, and game screenshots. Once uninstalled, these data cannot be recovered.

data.name: UninstallShadeDialog_WarningMessage2
data.value: If you have important data that has not been backed up, please back up before uninstalling.

data.name: ResetReShadeIniDialog_WarningTitle
data.value: Are you sure you want to continue resetting ReShade.ini?

data.name: ResetReShadeIniDialog_WarningMessage1
data.value:
Under normal circumstances, the ReShade.ini reset operation is automatically detected and runs in the background. This means that you usually do not need to manually reset ReShade.ini.
Generally, you only need to reset the ReShade.ini configuration file in the following two situations: · The Releases page explicitly states that you must/should reset the ReShade.ini configuration file to enable new features/fix bugs. · HoYoShade developers/contributors explicitly ask you to perform this operation.
Apart from these, you generally do not need to perform the ReShade.ini reset operation.
After the reset is complete, you need to delete the ReShade.ini configuration file that has been copied to the game process root directory, otherwise HoYoShade/OpenHoYoShade will not work as expected.

data.name: ResetReShadeIniDialog_WarningMessage2
data.value:
Resetting ReShade.ini will not cause the loss of shaders, plugins, presets, and game screenshots installed in HoYoShade/OpenHoYoShade.
Do you want to continue with the reset operation?

data.value: Use Starward Launcher to start public client games

data.name: SettingPage_UseStarwardLauncherDescription
data.value: When enabled, public client games will be launched using Starward Launcher. You need to ensure that the corresponding client has been located/installed in Starward.
